original_text: You yourself must serve God faithfully until the end of your life. You will die. But at the end of time you will rise to live again. Then you will receive the good things that God has prepared for you.’
korean_text: 너는 가서 마지막을 기다리라 이는 네가 평안히 쉬다가 끝날에는 네 몫을 누릴 것임이라

sentences.original_text: You yourself must serve God faithfully
until the end of your life
But at the end of time
you will rise to live again
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시 살기 위해 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then you will receive the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그 좋은 것들을 받을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that God has prepared for you
